notes: Unstaking delays are sourced from official Theta docs pages and extracted from the rendered HTML embedded in their SSR props.
Theta staking operations are native to the Theta chain; they are not directly introspected via standard EVM methods in this report.

guardian_stake_withdrawal.excerpt: Withdrawn stakes will be returned to your wallet address in approximately 48 hours.
guardian_stake_withdrawal.title: Guardian Stake Withdrawal Process

tfuel_staking_unstake.excerpt: Upon withdrawal of your TFuel, there is a ~60 hour unstaking period before your staked tokens will appear back in your Theta Wallet.
tfuel_staking_unstake.title: Elite Edge Node Staking Process

protocol.source_line: ReturnLockingPeriod uint64 = 28800      // number of blocks, approximately 2 days with 6 second block time
